de.affect.manage

Class GroupManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.affect.manage.GroupManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EmotionMaintenanceListener

    public class GroupManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements EmotionMaintenanceListener
    The class GroupManager stores all necessary data and provides emotion and mood computation functions for a group of characters.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Patrick Gebhard
